title: [Large-scale] Mentoring-Based Project Learning to Enhance Workplace Socialization Experiences of Taiwanese Engineers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic engineering knowledge and at least 3 years of work experience
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented training reflecting cultural contexts (relationship-centered socialization, Confucian cultural influences) for in-service Taiwanese engineers

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three relationship-building (guanxi) strategies required in Taiwanese workplace environments.
Learners can write a project report (5+ pages) solving technical issues based on mentoring feedback.
Learners can demonstrate communication scenarios considering sociocultural differences through role-play at least twice.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
